body.p:
Version 1.5.4 is primarily a check point for the development team. As part of the 1.5.4 release we have re-worked the build environment to automate the creation of the xpi files. We have also added the ability to create custom version for clients. A key area of the automated build process was to get the upgrade process working properly by creating the correct upgrade files with the correct version numbers. This had been a bit of a re-occuring problem which we should now have finally fixed.
There have also been a number of minor bugs fixed in this release. If you have feature requests or installation/configuration problems post them at http://forums.noojee.com.au
